name: SALE SAI SANNIDH
skills: Computer vision with YOLOv8 and OpenCV

projects.title: Real-time weapon detection system using YOLOv8 and Google Cloud
description: Developed a YOLOv8-based system for real-time weapon detection using a local camera and a cloud-hosted model.
Deployed the model on a Google Cloud VM, with dataset and weight management via GCP buckets.
Enabled full-frame detection with YOLOv8-formatted annotations, and automated training with new data uploads.
Achieved seamless real-time inference using direct IP communication over a Flask backend, no REST API.

projects.title: Hybrid audio steganography with LSB and phase coding techniques
description: Developed a hybrid audio steganography system using LSB and phase coding methods for secure message embedding and retrieval in audio files.
Designed a GUI interface for encoding and decoding messages, including robust error handling for edge cases like short audio files and incorrect passwords.
Conducted extensive testing, including quality analysis (PSNR, SNR), and ensured system reliability through comprehensive error management and validation.

education.institution: Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Technology, Hyderabad

certifications.title: Programming Essential in Python
certifications.description: Successfully completed the Python programming course offered by Cisco Networking Academy. Acquired practical skills in Python programming, awarded a certificate for proficiency in Python programming.
